quote: Better to fight than to live in fear.
author: K’Sante

quote: Fighting is preferable to being afraid.
author: K’Sante

quote: The depressed shift lie. Attack like an eagle.With each step, roar.

quote: The answer is me if the opponent asks.

quote: Ascended, warlords, and monsters are not that dissimilar.
author: K’Sante

quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
author: K’Sante

quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
author: K’Sante

quote: Do your worst, I have no fear.
author: K’Sante

quote: yourself to me; you won’t last

quote: “I don’t blame you. I’m quite strong.”

quote: “I don’t blame you. I’m quite strong.”
author: Nilah

quote: “When you flow as water, nothing can harm you.”

quote: “Master one evil, then destroy the rest.”

quote: “The bigger they are, the better the fight.”
author: Nilah

quote: “River of fate, guide me to greatness.”
author: Nilah

quote: “My epic will be long and joyous.”
author: Nilah

quote: “Water binds us, as it binds the demon.”
author: Nilah

quote: “Bliss in life, and bliss for ever after.”

quote: “This smile has immense power behind it… Be cautious.”

quote: “I decided to be joyful. I would pick it once more.”
author: Nilah

quote: “Demon, rage in your cell! I am in charge.”

quote: “No god nor devil can stop me!”
author: Nilah

quote: “Joy is all I can feel! It is challenging.”
author: Nilah

quote: “I need only three weapons: water, muscle, mind.”

author: Nilah

quote: “No adversary is too powerful for me.”

author: Nilah

quote: “Demon, give me five – OWW! Why are you doing that? That was far too difficult.”

quote: “I am the voice of the silence.”
author: Bel’Veth

quote: “Our victory was decided the moment I was born.”

quote: “Undisturbed, the void wanted nothing; now, we simply want.”

quote: “All that will remain is a sea of lavender.”

quote: “I spread deeper and deeper into the old void.”

quote: “I am all that is, and all that will ever be.”

quote: “Underneath us, a huge city is expanding. My town.”

quote: “The light of reality burned, until it did not.”

quote: “We will consume you, and become you.”

quote: “I must know what it means to exist.”

quote: “Humanity is the architect of its own extinction.”

quote: “They believe I am imprisoned and defeated. I, however, will not be dismayed. This bloodshed is honorable.”

quote: “I was up against nothing. Now, I would appreciate it.”

quote: “I cannot die… until all life ends.”

quote: “They will call me a god killer!”
author: Aatrox

quote: “As long as this form lives, I will punish them.”

quote: “My suffering… I will make it bloom.”

quote: “My darkness was not born, it was forged by my prison.”

quote: “Those who call me enemy, I welcome them.”
author: Aatrox

quote: “I will snuff out the light, I shall make darkness eternal!”
author: Aatrox

quote: “There is a darkness in my heart deeper than any shadow!”
author: Aatrox

quote: “I march to my demise… Nevertheless, I wish it were mine.
author: Aatrox

quote: “I will drown them in oceans of blood!”
author: Aatrox

quote: “Keep calm, Aatrox! Patience! Your liberation is imminent.”
author: Aatrox

quote: “Gods and mortals, they deserve only death!”
author: Aatrox

quote: “Dead men, bow! then I can separate your spine from your shoulders.”

quote: “March toward retribution… ‘Blood this world,’ I cry.”

quote: “I will render these mortals’ forms into my own!”
author: Aatrox

quote: “Their screams will be like the soothing hum of insects at dusk.”
author: Aatrox

quote: “They’ll label me a villain… Come, let me continue to deserve their enmity eternally.”

quote: “We once went by another name… We are Darkin right now.”
author: Aatrox

quote: “You must agree that I am more edgy than a devil. Because I’m a sword, you know. Hmm…”

quote: “I’m Aatrox, I suppose. I’m a spiritual person imprisoned in cutlery. What’s the deal, dude?”
author: Aatrox

quote: “Ah, this is a wonderful planet. I’m going to trash it, just so you know.”
author: Aatrox

quote: “I will hack and chop and cleave, and sunder the filth of your forms!”
author: Aatrox

quote: “I am not your enemy, I am the enemy!”
author: Aatrox

quote: “I’m Darkin. Your gods are afraid of me.”
author: Aatrox

quote: “I’ll amputate your limbs! I’ll carve your souls into stone.”
author: Aatrox

author: Aatrox

quote: “Sorrow… I will present it to you.”
author: Aatrox

quote: “I begged for death, now I am its bringer!”
author: Aatrox

quote: “You would challenge me? Come, I’ll show you hell.”

quote: “If you’d like to play with me, you’d better be sure you know the game.”

quote: “No one will stand in my way.”

quote: “We cannot let fear trap us in twilight.”

quote: “Our destiny is hidden in the night.”

quote: “It’s in your hand. in my heart.”

quote: “Coward! I wish you a peaceful passing.”

quote: “I will show them the power of an Iceborn.”
author: Ashe

quote: “We are all related through blood. Blood, blood, blood.”

quote: “The day our tribes are one, the world will tremble.”
author: Ashe

quote: “The day our tribes are one, the world will tremble.”
author: Ashe

quote: “The ice is not pain, it is surrender.”

quote: “I dream of a nation for my people.”

quote: “When I say Avarosa, I hear my mother, and her dreams.”

quote: “Take a good look; it’s the last you’ll get.”

quote: “Put that apple on your head, please, I mean it! Ah, uh, mm”

quote: “I do my best work from afar.”
author: Ashe

quote: “You are facing real ice. You will die.”

quote: “I was raised to fight. Ich bin Iceborn..”
author: Ashe

quote: “This world holds the key to Targon’s undoing.”

author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “I would burn the cosmos to catch Targon in the flames.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Terrible monsters are crawling throughout space. Please ask them to ignore the world.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “There are countless colors, but I suppose a single rainbow is a good start.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “This sun is off its axis – it’s been driving me crazy for eons now.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Planetary life… the insufferable byproduct of dim stars.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Nothing kindles wonder like the beauty of stars.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Celestial dragons live and die by our own beautiful rules.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Love is a true force, much like gravity. Try it occasionally.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Stars are not born, they are made… by me.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “A star’s birth is as violent as it is breathtaking.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “I’ve waited millennia to watch Targon fall.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “All beings are made of the same stardust.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “With a few more basic elements I could really make this place shimmer.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “The stars are not to thank for any good luck one may experience.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “This sun could do with a new core.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Any relevant species has been knocked back into the Stone Age once or twice.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “I wouldn’t use the stars as a guide. They are still being developed.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Each star is one of my hearts.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “My works are revered by worlds I have never even visited.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “The fashionable portion of the cosmos is wherever I am. even this.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “A star is so much more than a luminous sphere of wonder.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “If you ask me, we have set the bar too low for sentience.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “My home is in the cosmos, amongst my stars.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “The tales they spread concerning me? They probably are accurate.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “All terrestrial dragons are but pale imitations of my kind.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Perhaps there is more to this world than I thought – not much, but enough.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Why does anyone wish upon a star?”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Stars never align for anyone – except me, of course.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Only when darkness overwhelms the heavens will Targon realise its folly.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Targon will be the pyre from which I forge a new heaven.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “I see a universe drained of light and heat, where not even a story will survive.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “I grieve for every star never born.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Whenever I think my work is complete, I end up back here, under this sun.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Your demise will be sung about for ages to come – only thanks to its proximity to me, of course.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Your survival is not impossible, only very… very… very unlikely.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “The last thing you will see is me. Good for you.”

quote: “Making a wish. To see if the stars respond. Let me wait.”

quote: “What does the word underwhelm mean? Ah, I see. You.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “I once roamed the stars. I’m locked down here with you right now.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “On other worlds, there is emerging life more complex than you.”

quote: “I am not easily impressed. That is a positive comment.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Which star is your preferred one? That one was mine.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “I made the stars… but you inspire me to make more.”

quote: “Runeterra? I mean, literally, the name of this world is “magic earth.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “I made the stars to illuminate the perpetual nothing, and mortals use them for… relationship advice.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “A sun is unimaginable celestial power – and thrilled mortals use theirs to coordinate this ‘lunch time’.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Naturally, I adore Runeterra. There are additional buildings that you have.”

quote: “Lighten up, destruction needn’t be a maudlin affair.”

quote: “Suns never burn for the benefit of dust.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “I’m about to lob a star your way. Good fortune.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Nothing a little star fire cannot fix.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “Be helpful. Be a star. I’ll assist.”
author: Aurelion Sol

quote: “I’m what you would call a deniable asset.”

quote: “Your existence is a weight. I bring you liberty.”
author: Hecarim

quote: “You won’t live to see your world destroyed.”
author: Hecarim

quote: “Yes, yes, hurry, I have important work to get back to!”

author: Heimerdinger

quote: “Order and entropy are inexorably linked. But is it?”

author: Heimerdinger

quote: “Don’t worry, you can learn so much from failure.”

quote: “Why do people say ‘you can’t trust atoms’? Because they ‘make up everything’! Hehe!”

author: Heimerdinger

author: Heimerdinger

quote: “I require my adjustable reverse-ratcheting magnetic box wrench!”
author: Heimerdinger

quote: “Remain back! I’m going to do some science now.”
author: Heimerdinger

quote: “They’ll have a few screws loose by the end of this!”
author: Heimerdinger

quote: “This will put a wrench in their plans!”
author: Heimerdinger

quote: “I’m not big on sermons – broken bones teach better lessons.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “I destroy something if I despise it. I take something if I desire it.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “I am an educator. Bilgewater will pick up the skills necessary to survive. Only action will do.”

author: Illaoi

quote: “This ends one of two ways – they run, or I break them.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “I don’t scare, I don’t tire, and I don’t stop.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “Good? Evil? Why should we give such things any thought?”
author: Illaoi

quote: “Life is the sweetness of fruit, and the joy of battle!”
author: Illaoi

quote: “There is joy in food… and fighting.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “Ah, everyone has a plan, until they get punched in the face.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “Man lives and man dies. Change is beneficial.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “They will learn or they will die.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “There are gracious and benevolent gods. One of those is not mine.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “The water is serene. It is sparked by our wants.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “Even if I die, I die in motion.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “The waves will drag you down, unless you fight to shore.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “How was I able to adore just one man? They are too prone to break.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “Wisdom is frequently a kick in the head.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “We are not a single soul. We are numerous.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “Many deities demand adoration. They are incapable gods.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “My god is not love – it is a kick in the pants.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “Without change, something sleeps inside us, and seldom awakens.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “Many people pass away. Worthy souls take on new guises.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “Names don’t matter, Bearded Lady or Nagakabouros, I say. “Action makes””
author: Illaoi

quote: “It is the storm that is life.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “Live your life, chase what you desire, what else matters?”
author: Illaoi

quote: “A fool and his spirit are easily parted.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “Watch your mouth, or I’ll slap the soul out of you.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “Fight me, if you have the spirit.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “I want you to hit me as hard as you can.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “Smile, child, or I’ll shove your jaw into your brain.”
author: Illaoi

quote: “Ha ha ha, you think you can beat me?”

quote: “I’ve traveled through the shimmering plains and fished in the grassy rivers. The land is aware of me.”

quote: “Keep in mind what has been lost. Fight for the unrealized.”

quote: “*Laughs* They thought they could tame our land.”

quote: “To live under a boot is not to live.”

quote: “I carry a lot more than these blades.”
author: Irelia

quote: “We are the children of the First Lands, and we will not be slaves!”
author: Irelia

quote: “I remember when I danced for fun.”
author: Irelia

quote: “Live today like you’re going to die tomorrow.”
author: Irelia

quote: “What strange power works through me, I do not know.”

quote: “I move to unsung melodies and unbeaten rhythms.”

quote: “Zelos made the funniest jokes… I miss them so much.”

quote: “Always continue to learn. There is always a form you are unfamiliar with.”
author: Irelia

quote: “If they capture me they’ll kill me… *Laughs* If.”

quote: “We do this for those who came before us, and those who come next.”

quote: “Ours is the land of magic, and that is worth dying for.”

quote: “Their weapons are great, but our will is greater.”
author: Irelia

quote: “We are the only masters of our fate!”
author: Irelia

quote: “Do we desire safety? or unfree? We have an option.”
author: Irelia

quote: “Better times there were, and will be again.”
author: Irelia

quote: “Dance with what brought you: in this case, blades.”
author: Irelia

quote: “I didn’t mean to take the lead. They fought after me while I struggled.”
author: Irelia

quote: “An ocean separates us… for good reason.”
author: Irelia

quote: “These blades were whetted on the bones of tyrants!”
author: Irelia

quote: “Act, and the whole world will move!”
author: Irelia

quote: “They’ll know me as the last to lay down her weapons.”
author: Irelia

quote: “The voices of my brothers still carry on the wind.”
author: Irelia

quote: “I am both the tranquil sea and the tempest.”
author: Irelia

quote: “Stay ready, and there is no need to get ready.”
author: Irelia

quote: “Every form has a name that only the wind knows. O-ma at least stated as much.”
author: Irelia

quote: “I don’t mean to be rude! I have a friendly and loving nature.”
author: Irelia

quote: “I really ought to have warmed up first. Okay, well.”

quote: “They arrived seeking our magic. Their lives will be forfeited.”
author: Irelia

quote: “Have no harm… Unless they attempt to take your house.”
author: Irelia

quote: “Nobody is capable of what I do. So I’ll carry it out.”
author: Irelia

quote: “A warship can be sunk by a single rock. a thousand pebbles, too… (laughs)”
author: Irelia

quote: “Peace must sometimes be bought with blood.”
author: Irelia

quote: “There’s a saying: ‘Never fight Ionians on their home soil.'”
author: Irelia

quote: “Even if they kill me, they’ll still have to fight the land.”
author: Irelia

quote: “My O-ma always said I had angry feet.”
author: Irelia

quote: “Yes, I can fight, of course. I had four siblings growing up.”
author: Irelia

quote: “I’ve never killed a person… just a lot of Noxians.”
author: Irelia

quote: “Give them an inch, they’ll take a kingdom.”
author: Irelia

quote: “I once served the light, until it cast me out.”
author: Irelia

quote: “I committed myself to the shadows. It has remitted the debt.”
author: Irelia

quote: “I’m doomed to carry these blades… forever.”
author: Irelia

quote: “The remaining plane? I don’t need it, eh.”
author: Irelia

quote: “If the mission goes to hell, there’s always the blades.”
author: Irelia

quote: “If they find me, they’ll regret it.”
author: Irelia

quote: “Hurt and subvert – that’s how I do it.”
author: Irelia

quote: “Stay under their radar, and if that doesn’t work, cut their heads off.”
author: Irelia

quote: “The ice kept me alive. It takes it now.”
author: Irelia

quote: “The weather? It didn’t worry me, eh.”

quote: “This ice never melts… just like our will.”

quote: “Hope they brought armor… and a sweater.”
author: Irelia

quote: “Peace does not last forever. It needs to be sown continuously.”
author: Irelia

quote: “The seeds of our order carry on the wind.”
author: Irelia

quote: “Beauty can grow from the murkiest water.”
author: Irelia

quote: “They see only the flower, but these roots run deep.”

quote: “Raise a hand to us, and you’ll find it missing.”

quote: “These are the rules. You live after leaving.”

author: Irelia

quote: “No, no, no, wait, wait, wait, wait. *Cleans throat*
author: Irelia

quote: “Wait, wait, wait, wait.” *Angry grunt* Hold on.”
author: Irelia

quote: “Animals have more to offer than warm pelts and meat.”

quote: “Sprint like a snail, and you will never twist your ankle.”

quote: “Everything is connected in the strangest ways.”
author: Ivern

quote: “I love how the grass is fluffy on my toes.”

quote: “I find that the stranger life gets, the more it seems to make sense.”

quote: “Sun and rain are the only magic I need.”

quote: “Laugh like a hyena, and friends will gallop to your side.”
author: Ivern

quote: “Every river reaches the ocean in its own way.”
author: Ivern

quote: “I wonder what adventure today has in store for all of us.”

quote: “One day, I’ll root in one place and be everywhere.”

quote: “I tread lightly so as not to hurt the dandelions.”

quote: “Never trust a butterfly with a secret.”

quote: “Oh, the sun’s making me awfully melty.”

quote: “Never trust a jelly roll to do a donut job.”

quote: “Be appreciative of this time. the one as well. And this one, too. Oh, and this one is also excellent.”

quote: “Some buds need a little push to blossom.”

quote: “It’s okay, Gromp is a slow learner too.”

quote: “Say hello to the winds of— (double cough, clears throat) I don’t know what came over me.”

quote: “By my will, this shall be finished.”

author: Jhin

author: Jhin

quote: “Killing you will be one of my finest works.”
author: Jhin

quote: “You are average. My brilliance will take your place.”

quote: “When they find you, they will cry.”

quote: “Are you the hunter… or the prey?”

quote: “You wouldn’t last a day in the void.”

quote: “I came for the hunt, but I’ll stay for the fruit.”
author: Kai’Sa

quote: “I like it here, I just might stay.”

quote: “Feed the beast, or be its meal.”
author: Kai’Sa

quote: “Forgiveness is hard, but so very worth it.”
author: Kai’Sa

quote: “This place is beautiful, I’m going to save it.”
author: Kai’Sa

quote: “This skin is fashioned for survival, and honed by instinct.”
author: Kai’Sa

quote: “It’s a good day for a hunt.”

quote: “I came back for the others who could not.”
author: Kai’Sa

quote: “Hold our ground, attack them in theirs.”

quote: “Survival means never stopping, the void knows that too.”
author: Kai’Sa

quote: “This suit hunts in the manner I choose.”
author: Kai’Sa

quote: “It’s fight or flight, only now I do not run.”
author: Kai’Sa

quote: “This world is changing… we decide into what.”
author: Kai’Sa

quote: “Danger is real, fear is an illusion.”
author: Kai’Sa

author: Kai’Sa

author: Kai’Sa

quote: “I am the antidote, for the rivers of poison flowing beneath us all.”

author: Kai’Sa

author: Kai’Sa

quote: “Love… Fear… Whatever it is termed, everyone is driven by the need to survive.”

quote: “I can rid them of these monsters, but who will save them from themselves?”

quote: “Let your anger go. It serves no purpose.”
author: Kai’Sa

quote: “This place is too beautiful to be decimated by the Void.”
author: Kai’Sa

author: Kai’Sa

quote: “Maybe someday they will come to accept me, for now they will need me.”
author: Kai’Sa

quote: “The Void consumes everything, leaving only emptiness in its wake.”

author: Kai’Sa

quote: “It’s fight or flight, only now I do not run.”
author: Kai’Sa

quote: “Look closely, and your prey will show you how to kill it.”
author: Kai’Sa

quote: “Monsters are approaching. We’ll be all set. I’ll guarantee it.”

quote: “Survival is an instinct we all have.”
author: Kai’Sa

quote: “This is my purpose, learn from me.”

quote: “Nothing shall turn us from our path.”

quote: “Let’s see how many spears you can endure!”

author: Kalista

quote: “We act as one – two – three – cease this!”

quote: “There will be no escape – I said no escape!”

quote: “I have seen two paths and made another between.”

quote: “We have learned as much as we have suffered.”

quote: “I know your spirit, but I must stop your heart.”

quote: “An ideal is nothing… until you fight for it.”

quote: “You know what they say: Karma always catches up to you.”

author: Karthus

author: Karthus

quote: Your magic is powerless against me!

quote: Keep friends close and enemies guessing.

quote: Why? I can, so I will.

author: Maokai

quote: I am unable to relax! Not in the tiniest branch, not even!
author: Maokai

quote: They destroy life! I’ll step on them.
author: Maokai

quote: Drink deep of what magic remains.
author: Maokai

quote: I do nature’s bidding… to the very end.
author: Maokai

quote: Oh… where did I put that sapling?
author: Maokai

quote: Living or dead, they are all the same.
author: Maokai

quote: We need to uproot our roots. Darkness taints the landscape.
author: Maokai

quote: Life here existed in a time before death.
author: Maokai

quote: Mortals, what have you accomplished? What do I have?
author: Maokai

quote: A shadow has fallen, as men have fallen.
author: Maokai

quote: There is beauty here, even now, in the human’s fear.
author: Maokai

quote: I will show them what was lost in the ruination.
author: Maokai

quote: Peace is not in stillness! It’s the end.
author: Maokai

quote: If I am already lost, I will take them with me.
author: Maokai

quote: They were once human. They are merely in my way at this time.
author: Maokai

quote: Mortals irritate me, like an itch beneath my bark.
author: Maokai

quote: I am unable to stop. I must protect the forest.
author: Maokai

quote: The Mist haunts my every move, yet I resist.
author: Maokai

quote: I will end this misuse of magic!
author: Maokai

quote: I will fight for every pebble, every blade of grass.
author: Maokai

quote: I was at ease once. A purpose is preferable.
author: Maokai

quote: Once my limbs reached for the sky, now for nearest mortal neck!
author: Maokai

quote: I can watch the mortals doom themselves from here.
author: Maokai

quote: The green in these plants, it is something I have lost.
author: Maokai

quote: There is life still untouched by the Mist.
author: Maokai

quote: The young sprouts beneath my feet, they tremble.
author: Maokai

quote: The sapling does not fall far from the treant!
author: Maokai

quote: If a human screams in the forest, will anyone hear it?
author: Maokai

quote: The circle of life starts with death.
author: Maokai

quote: If only the humans were vegetarians.
author: Maokai

quote: I love all my saplings, especially how they taste.
author: Maokai

quote: It is good to ungnarl my limbs.
author: Maokai

quote: To find life, I will snuff yours out.
author: Maokai

quote: This power is mine to command.
author: Maokai

quote: Vengeance may be hollow, but so is my trunk!
author: Maokai

quote: The blessed waters turn within me.
author: Maokai

quote: In the end, they all scream!
author: Maokai

quote: The focused mind can pierce through stone.
author: Master Yi

quote: Do not let your pride blind you.
author: Master Yi

quote: I will show you the path.
author: Master Yi

quote: A true master is an eternal student.
author: Master Yi

quote: You wish to learn the hard way, I see.
author: Master Yi

quote: I will take an eye… heh, as if I don’t have enough already.
author: Master Yi

quote: The key to immortality? Not dying.
author: Master Yi

quote: This will be… a harsh lesson.
author: Master Yi

quote: Sure you can handle me, summoner?
author: Miss Fortune

quote: You have dangerous eyes… I enjoy that.
author: Miss Fortune

quote: I’ve got a good feeling about this.
author: Miss Fortune

quote: Watch your mouth kid, or you’ll find yourself respawning at home!
author: Miss Fortune

quote: How do my guns sound to you? “Awe and Shock!”
author: Miss Fortune

quote: All will die, all will be mine.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: Shed the frailty of flesh, embrace the cold edge of iron.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: I will silence the incessant thrum of mortal hearts.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: I sunder the natural cycle, so that all may be preserved.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: Fools fear death, the strong wield it.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: All mortals reek with the stench of decaying flesh.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: Mortals plan in fear for tomorrow, I build for eternity.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: The dead belong to me, the living shall be next.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: I left the husk of mortality behind.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: The ungrateful call me tyrant, the wise call me lord.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: Their gods cannot save them, from me.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: All will bend their knee in fear and fealty.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: Weaklings cower in the light, I bring eternal darkness.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: The unworthy are dust, doomed to wither and fade.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: I will grind their petty souls into mortar.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: Lives are temporary, I stand eternal.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: Only the worthy receive the gift of Nightfall’s kiss.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: I raise my iron fist to subjugate the living.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: I forged Nightfall from mortal terror.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: Ah, life is a bitter shame.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: Death by my hand is a blessing.
author: Mordekaiser

quote: I am bound, but I will not break.
author: Morgana

quote: Your worst decisions will haunt you.
author: Morgana

quote: I once believed that the air above was pleasant. Now, I find it oppressive.
author: Morgana

quote: I prefer an honest sinner over the righteous liar.
author: Morgana

quote: Nothing makes you feel alive like knowing you might die.
author: Morgana

quote: I have witnessed cheating by the godly and witnessed liars choose virtue. Maybe I’ll catch a Yordle sneeze today.
author: Morgana

quote: My sister used holy fire to cauterize her wound. I’m still here.
author: Morgana

quote: Those who soar amongst the clouds lose sight of the life below.
author: Morgana

quote: I move with mortals while she languishes with her lofty ideals
author: Morgana

quote: To see the world in black and white is to blind yourself to all of life’s colors.
author: Morgana

quote: We may fall today, but still we persist.
author: Morgana

quote: Shall I remind you of your vulnerability?
author: Morgana

quote: I have experienced falling before. You will also.
author: Morgana

quote: Loves me, doesn’t love me. Loves me, doesn’t love me. Ughh.
author: Morgana

quote: Loves me, doesn’t love me. Loves me or doesn’t love me. adores me!
author: Morgana

quote: Do not run from your shadow!
author: Morgana

quote: Once I had grace, now I have pain.
author: Morgana

quote: My wings are heavy, but not as heavy as my heart.
author: Morgana

quote: My wings are bound but my soul flies.
author: Morgana

quote: To walk barefoot, skin to soil, is true grace.
author: Morgana

quote: Do not conflate darkness with evil.
author: Morgana

quote: I walk so I can feel each fracture of the earth.
author: Morgana

quote: Some people invoke fate. I forge my own trail.
author: Morgana

quote: Demacia learned all the wrong lessons.
author: Morgana

quote: I shall show them what it is to fall.
author: Morgana

quote: Betrayal never comes from your enemies.
author: Morgana

quote: We are the sum of our mistakes.
author: Morgana

quote: Only those you love, can break your heart.
author: Morgana

quote: To love is to be bound.
author: Morgana

quote: Shadow is not as dark as one might think.
author: Morgana

quote: With every step I forge my own fate.
author: Morgana

quote: I won’t leave the place that helped mold me. neither the errors.
author: Morgana

quote: This world is all I have.
author: Morgana

quote: Righteousness. A broken shield that I will topple.
author: Morgana

quote: I would cut off my wings if there were steel strong enough.
author: Morgana

quote: Demacia had forgotten what war really cost. I can recall.
author: Morgana

quote: Justice is a powerful people’s deception. I have my own truths.
author: Morgana

quote: I did not fall from grace, I leapt.
author: Morgana

quote: My wings have wind memories. not anymore.
author: Morgana

quote: You cannot break a shattered soul.
author: Morgana

quote: My flaws are a badge of honor.
author: Morgana

quote: Some say I’m evil. Shall I show them to be wrong?
author: Morgana

quote: My shadow outruns my sister’s light
author: Morgana

quote: We are shaped by our foes.
author: Morgana

quote: Whether by chains or by wings, we are all bound.
author: Morgana

quote: Hmm, battles bring out so many emotions.
author: Morgana

quote: My bonds can only be broken by death. I am immortal, too.
author: Morgana

quote: Not all light is a gift.
author: Morgana

quote: I find beauty in these shadows.
author: Morgana

quote: I am aware of my enemies’ emotions. They have good reason to be scared.
author: Morgana

quote: I don’t hide my pain, I wield it.
author: Morgana

quote: Home, a place that never leaves you.
author: Morgana

quote: Shall I remind you of your vulnerability?
author: Morgana

quote: I have experienced falling before. You will also.
author: Morgana

quote: When Morgana gathers flower petals, she finds petals that say, “Loves me not.”
author: Morgana

quote: Loves me, doesn’t love me. Loves me, doesn’t love me. Ughh.
author: Morgana

quote: Loves me, doesn’t love me. Loves me or doesn’t love me. adores me!
author: Morgana

quote: Do not run from your shadow!
author: Morgana

quote: I decide what the tide will bring.
author: Nami

quote: We are all tied to the ocean.
author: Nami

quote: My people are counting on me.
author: Nami

quote: I still hear the song of the sea.
author: Nami

quote: I will see my home again.
author: Nami

quote: The softest water wears down the hardest rock.
author: Nami

quote: Nami showers her adversary with water.
author: Nami

quote: Afraid to get your feet wet?
author: Nami

quote: Three tiny sharks that are swimming around her are called by Nami, and she makes them jump.
author: Nami

quote: You’re the catch sometimes. You may occasionally be the lure.
author: Nami

quote: The sea holds fearsome creatures… and them.
author: Nami

quote: I moonlight as a shark caller.
author: Nami

quote: The ocean will sweep them away.
author: Nami

quote: Life and death are eternal cycles. They will perish, but we will live.
author: Nasus

quote: Burdens sleep best in their tombs.
author: Nasus

quote: Perhaps Shurima was meant to fall.
author: Nasus

quote: The sky is naught but dying stars.
author: Nasus

quote: Between life and death lies immortality.
author: Nasus

quote: The past is a tapestry of what lies ahead.
author: Nasus

quote: Shurima is not of this time.
author: Nasus

quote: Your legacy shall drift away; blown into eternity, like the sands of the desert.
author: Nasus

quote: There is such potential in one mortal life; you have wasted yours.
author: Nasus

quote: No, I will not fetch the ball.
author: Nasus

quote: Who released the dogs? Three woofs are heard.
author: Nasus

quote: My bite is worse than my bark.
author: Nasus

quote: Some spirits are fated to burn.
author: Nasus

quote: A cycle underlies all of life. Yours is finished.
author: Nasus

quote: We approach a time of reckoning.
author: Nasus

quote: You are in the deep end now!
author: Nautilus

quote: The Nautilus’s 'swims' in the air after setting his anchor in the earth.
author: Nautilus

quote: Sometimes I think this anchor just weighs me down.
author: Nautilus

quote: Slow down? No! Fast, fast, fast!
author: Neeko

quote: I’ll get better! I’ll develop! I’ll do it, Neeko!
author: Neeko

quote: Sharing emotions, colors, and memories is magical. People are connected by magic.
author: Neeko

quote: How could someone miss their home? Home is everywhere.
author: Neeko

quote: Neeko is on her fourth tail!
author: Neeko

quote: The ghosts surround me everywhere. Warm, just like hugs!
author: Neeko

quote: Neeko does not want to be here when… the others arrive.
author: Neeko

quote: This is really thrilling! Everything is collapsing!
author: Neeko

quote: Do not be attached to one body. There are countless more.
author: Neeko

quote: Tail, no! Now, we must be angry. Individuals without tails! Do they feel alone? Yes.
author: Neeko

quote: Everyone invited to picnic following fight! even adversaries.
author: Neeko

quote: If Neeko knows your sho’ma, Neeko knows you.
author: Neeko

quote: What do I do now? discover cheesebreads? Ooh! Take a picnic.
author: Neeko

quote: The Oovi-Kats vanished. Now that Neeko has her own tribe.
author: Neeko

quote: Neeko might be attracted to birds. also “bird people.”
author: Neeko

quote: We’re going to fight now? Let’s go!
author: Neeko

quote: If Neeko becomes Neeko, what does she look like?
author: Neeko

quote: Beauty shines from inside, where the heart dances.
author: Neeko

quote: Neeko holds a small portion of each person’s Sho’ma. They are lovely.
author: Neeko

quote: Neeko spins her tail to hover in the air, mimicking a helicopter.
author: Neeko

quote: Neeko used magic to affect you. Shoom! Shoom!
author: Neeko

quote: Bright signals danger, so leave it alone, Mr. Nice Neeko.
author: Neeko

quote: Let me show you the way.
author: Nidalee

quote: Here, mousy, mousy, mousy,” a human said.
author: Nidalee

quote: Nidalee licks her paw as a coo.
author: Nidalee

quote: Nidalee turns over and lies on her back (cougar).
author: Nidalee

quote: Claw or spear, your end’s the same.
author: Nidalee

quote: I’ll show these house cats real claws.
author: Nidalee

quote: People are flames to be blotted out.
author: Nocturne

quote: Are you my nightmare, or am I yours?
author: Nocturne

quote: Bring me more flesh bags to slice up!
author: Nocturne

quote: Weather forecast for tonight: dark, with a chance of pain!
author: Nocturne

quote: Drip drop, the sound of blood.
author: Nocturne

quote: And so they traveled, over mountains and glaciers! And this one time, there was a village full of people turned into stone! (Willump sighs.) We couldn't help them. (Willump noises) But we're gonna help everyone else!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Once upon a time, there was a yeti, and a boy. (Willump noises) But this time I get to be the yeti! Roar!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: It's not a flute, Willump. It's a sword, called... Svellsongur! (Willump noises) Fine, I'll stick to snowballs...
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Uh-huh. (Willump noises) No way! (Willump noises) Woah, that's the best story my ears ever heard! (Willump noises) But... no one got hit in the face with a snowball. (Willump noises) 'Til now! Gotcha, you big galumpa!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: We've come to eat candy canes and kick naughty list butt! (Willump noises) And everyone's on the naughty list!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: We're gonna demolisherize you! (Willump noises) Uh, maulerate? (Willump noises) Marfigure? (Willump noises) Grr. The point is, you're not gonna find it very pleasant!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: No more heroes! Now, it's crunchageddon!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Willump, I can't believe they had a t-shirt in your size! XL as in 'extra limbs'!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: It's Freljord Frost versus Azubu Frost!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Winning a championship is basically like saving the world. (Willump noises) That's why TPA are my heroes!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Uh-oh, I think Lissandra's mad at me. (Willump noises) But I won't let her hurt you, Willump!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: If you could do anything, Willump, what would you do? (Willump noises) Scratch behind your ears?! That's not an adventure!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Let's get in there and thwack some stuff!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: I bet you three icicles I can fly, I just never jumped hard enough.
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Rumble, tumble, and... uh, scrumble! (Willump noises) Willump loves to scrumble! (Willump noises) *laughs*
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: This is just like in my favorite song! Only this time, it's about us!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Keep your eyes open for treasure. Like skulls or... rusty swords! Cool!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: The only thing louder than Willump's steps is his snoring!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: A snowball is never just a snowball, if you believe in magic!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Sometimes the world's more interesting when you close your eyes. I see... globlins! Whoa, they have warts. That's how you know they're bad guys.
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: You know what would be fun, Willump? Everything! If you're there with me!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: They only hurt people 'cause there's something sad in their hearts? (Willump noises) Then I'm gonna knock it out!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Last one there's a stinky old yeti! (Willump noises) Fine... magical too...
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: How many words do yetis have for 'snow'? (Willump noises) And for 'farts'? (Willump noises) I knew it!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: It's cold. (Willump noises) I'm glad you're here, Willump.
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: It's okay to be sad sometimes, Willump. That's how you know when you're happy!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Battle is the song I came to sing!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Willump knows the way! (Willump noises) He knows lots of stuff.
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Are we there, yeti? Hehehe, get it? (Willump noises) You're laughing on the inside, huh?
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Someone out there needs our help!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: This day keeps getting more bizonkerific!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: You can't give up if you're standing on a yeti! That's as up as it gets!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Let's put the venture... in adventure!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: There's nothing to it but to do it!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: I bet we could have fun over there.
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: I eat heroic deeds for breakfast! (Willump noises) Willump prefers Krugs, all in one gulp... (Willump noises) Ugh.
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Everyone knows heroes are brave, and they hit stuff really hard! But only I know the true secret. (Willump noises) No! Not that!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: My mom's out there somewhere. (Willump noises) I can hear her, Willump, every time I go to sleep...
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: I bet, if we stayed really still, we become invisible! (Willump noises) I'll always see you, Willump.
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Your steps are the rhythm! (Willump sings.) And my flute's the melody!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Heroes don't need hugs. (Willump noises) Okay, they're not looking now. Bring it in, you big fursnarggle!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Do your battlecry, Willump! (Willump noises) *laughs* No, not that one!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: We're off like a dirty tunic! (Willump noises) That's what one of the elders used to say. (Willump noises) I wonder if he's alright.
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Let's count our steps! Eleventy-seven and one, eleventy-seven and two...
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Slow down, Willump! You're gonna cause an avalanche! Before I can!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Ughh, old people always doom the world, so it's up to kids to save it!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Keep playing, Willump! No one can tell us not to! We already broke the rules with the super-mega punch!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: I can't pronounciate your real name! (Willump noises) Well... you can't say Nunu either.
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Before we can save the world, first we gotta see it!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Woah, too fast! The snot just froze to my nose!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: The dragon's maw opened wide, and fire bloomed deep down inside. The hero saw a flash of teeth, and... Maybe I'll tell you what happened next time, Willump
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: The troll was fierce, his breath was cold. Not blood, but ice you would behold. To spill from wounds, the bites of steel. In flesh was hero's blade concealed! Being a hero is awesome!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: A creature great, a mountain guard. A terrible monster, its own past scarred. In ruin it rages and magic swirls, but its power once saved the world. Woah, that guy sounds cool!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: The witch hissed as her spell was spun. And heroes raised their voice as one, 'For glory, for freedom!' They joined the fight, but their cries were trapped in darkest ice. Lissandra taught me that one!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Ice, wind, spray of souls. Lay of seekers, the elder toll. Locked for eons, a frozen key. The power lies inside me!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: We've told the tales of iron forged, we've cowered at the thunder's roar, but if you sail, the sister seek. Seal Sister from the ocean speaks! Willump, I want to meet her!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: The gods are gone, the world their forge. Now flames are gone, and words our torch. Against the cold, this song I sing, a spark of my own forging! Well, technically my mom's.
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Steel flashed as it cut through air, and web guarding the spider's lair. Eight legs, covered in claws and hair. A web of danger, life ensnared!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Our caravan used to race Anivia all across the Freljord!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: My mom said as long as I remember her, she'll always come back... like Anivia.
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Braum? I knew you were real! Will you be my dad?
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: The Braum vault door! I bet Ornn carved it! (Willump noises) What? That's not a spoiler!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: I can be a hero too! I'll show everyone in the Freljord Frostguard Frostguard!

quote: I hope Lissandra's not mad. Huh, her face might freeze that way.

quote: It's not how you die, Olaf! It's how you live! Even I know that!

quote: Uh-oh, Willump. He's got two axes, one for each of us.

quote: Sometimes fighting can teach you things... like how to forgive your brother.

quote: Ornn! My mom used to sing your song as the ashes died in the fire. It still makes me feel warm.

quote: Believe in yourself, Tryndamere, and you won't need to call people chickens call people chickens behind their backs.

quote: I wanna be a barbarian when I grow up!

quote: Volibear! Uh, sorry. I mean, the Volibear. Or, uhm, Mr. The Volibear... sir...

quote: Knock knock. (Willump noises) A Frostguard! (Willump noises) W- Willump! You're not supposed to smash him!

quote: We'll always win, 'cause we have something to fight for! (Willump noises) Not princesses! Gross!

quote: I learned how to fight from a song. (Willump noises) That's not weird! (Willump noises) It's cool!

quote: Put some claw into it, Willump!

quote: Saving the world is so much fun!

quote: Let's kick bad guy butt! *laughs* 'Cause they never wear butt armor!

quote: You bop and I'll boop, Willump!

quote: It's not fighting if you're having fun!

quote: I have sworn to vanquish all kinds of bad stuff, starting with your face!

quote: Something tells me they don't want a hug.

quote: I got your back, Willump! Woah! Almost fell off!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: Mess with the yeti and you get the boy!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: I don't know what 'dastardly' means, but I'm gonna punch it!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: No wonder they're so angry, they forgot to bring snowballs!
author: Nunu & Willump

quote: C’mon, I won’t hurt you. I promise!
author: Olaf

quote: C’mon, I won’t hurt you. I promise!

quote: The worth of a man can be measured by the length of his beard, and the girth of his belt buckle.
author: Olaf

quote: We’ll slay your adversaries. That’ll be enjoyable.

quote: I am aware of their motivations. I am aware of how to halt the ticking.

quote: Orianna spins around and reclines. She is caught by the ball.

quote: They fall apart so quickly. How do you assemble them once more?
author: Orianna

quote: Orianna spins around and reclines. She collapses to the floor.
author: Orianna

quote: When you fall, you get right back up.

quote: It is childish to favor one tool over another, but Hammer is my favorite.

quote: Humans have done some things right: beer, dark beer.

quote: Once a human kneels, they rarely stand again.

quote: I do not need company; only a wall, to keep out company.

quote: Backbreaking labor is life’s greatest pleasure.

quote: The other gods are unable to comprehend me. Good, hmph.

quote: Flee, and the spear will find your back.

quote: It is not why I fight, but who I fight for.

quote: I cast my excuses into the dirt.

quote: Onward! One single direction is indicated by the spear.

quote: Even impaled on a blade, I will press forward!.

quote: We live our lives in the shadow cast by a mountain.

quote: Death is the only thing that ever embraced me.

quote: I wield my fate as a weapon!
author: Pantheon

quote: There is no pity, no mercy.
author: Pantheon

quote: Pressing forward is not the same as running from your mistakes.

quote: If they bleed I will call them sister or brother.
author: Pantheon

quote: The world moves as the heavens lie still.
author: Pantheon

quote: Because we fall, the climb must be our destination.

quote: I wear a helm so that I am only a soldier.

quote: I will carve my scars into the heavens.

quote: I buried regret in a grave, along with my name.

quote: The power of these ‘gods’ is but an echo of our own.

quote: I do not set the pace, I race against it.

author: Pantheon

quote: If they kill me, at least I die a man.
author: Pantheon

quote: I am the tip of the spear, raised against surrender!
author: Pantheon

quote: I have found my limit a thousand times, and still I press further.
author: Pantheon

quote: The people cry out for strength that is already theirs!
author: Pantheon

quote: I am no more than a soldier, and no less.
author: Pantheon

quote: I call upon the stars… to bake my bountiful breads!
author: Pantheon

quote: Fresh from my bakery… my secret dream.
author: Pantheon

quote: Before you fight, you must rise.
author: Pantheon

quote: Between each beat of my heart, I strike.
author: Pantheon

quote: You will not fail if it is worth it.
author: Pantheon

quote: A shield and a spear. The pantheon.
author: Pantheon

author: Poppy

author: Poppy

author: Poppy

quote: Jokes? I am aware of jokes.
author: Poppy

quote:
A Demacian, a Noxian and a Freljordian walk into a tavern.
The barkeep asks, ‘What’ll it be?'
‘Uh, I’ll have a wine,’ the Demacian replies. No, hold on, a beer! Yeah…
The Noxian then declares, “I’ll have a… a wine.” Yes, he desires a wine.
The Freljordian responds, “I’ll drink anything, as long as—” Hold on, let me rephrase that.
author: Poppy

quote:
A Noxian, a Targonian and a Piltie are robbing a bank.
The bank guy says, ‘I’ll give you whatever you want.'
The Noxian says, ‘I’ll take whatever gold you got back there.'
“Gimme all your gemstones,” the Targonian exclaims.
The Piltie then asks, “Can I own this bank? I own this bank, so… ” He owns the bank, thus he has nothing to want.
author: Poppy

quote: Keep swinging til’ you hit something.
author: Poppy

quote: You are… definitely not the hero.
author: Poppy

quote: “The wheel spins, day turns to darkness… time to make colors!”
author: Zoe

quote: “I want to connect with someone else and have fun! I do however listen well.”
author: Zoe

quote: “I enjoy everything around me! the animals. And the flora, too!”
author: Zoe

quote: “Are we through with this world yet? Hello? Hellooo?”
author: Zoe

quote: “No one is required to mature if they don’t want to. Or, perhaps, they do. However, I don’t.”
author: Zoe

quote: “I discuss the upcoming adjustments. That is the aim of this. It’s a rather simple task.”
author: Zoe

quote: “Dusk and dawn; the ending is the beginning.”
author: Zoe

quote: “I’m not a boy-crazy girl! Simply said, I haven’t found a boyfriend yet.”
author: Zoe

quote: “I had no idea that boys even existed! I really want someone to take my hand and gaze into my eyes right now! …A sweet one.”
author: Zoe

quote: “Daylight is too bright, the night is too dark, I want more colors!”
author: Zoe

quote: “I should visit this location every millenium! I enjoy it.”

quote: “Ugh, Targon has rules, but blehh, I’m gonna hang out anyway.”

quote: “If this wasn’t so pretty, I wouldn’t care that it’s all about to change.”
author: Zoe

quote: “While I wait, I will stay happy!” Zoe snorts and giggles. “Oh…”
author: Zoe

quote: “The tide of time. It also takes in order to give.”
author: Zoe

quote: “In my superpants, I’m going to dance. Because if not, I would be naked.”
author: Zoe

quote: “Do not look into the eyes of a god, or fly into its ears.”
author: Zoe

quote: “I’m meant to deliver a message to them! But I misplaced the corresponding acoustic pattern.”
author: Zoe

quote: “I hope this planet endures… I enjoy it.”
author: Zoe

quote: “The eye that looks ahead for the safe course is closed forever.”
author: Zoe

quote: “The stars are up to no good. Likewise, gas clouds. They have a fart-like odor. Zoe sings scats.”
author: Zoe

quote: “I wanna wanna, go to some place, place place.”

quote: “Something positive is about to occur. with glimmer!”
author: Zoe

quote: “No one free is afraid of… mischief.”
author: Zoe

quote: “What amuses you in this area? What about that over there?”
author: Zoe

quote: “I wouldn’t trust myself, but I would absolutely enjoy myself, you know. (Inhales) I like myself.”
author: Zoe

quote: “Every day and season comes to an end. And start a fresh project!”
author: Zoe

quote: “I like this virtual reality, especially its lack of network security!”
author: Zoe

quote: “Every seemingly moving object is actually a parallax! Just far more so here.”
author: Zoe

quote: “This virtual reality is incredibly realistic! If anyone is on chat, I wonder. Hello? Hellooo?”
author: Zoe

quote: “Online alternate reality. The berf the gerf is now.”

quote: “I thought my VR rig wasn’t working, but this is pretty swank!”
author: Zoe

quote: “Ooh! How amazing are these VR auto-render foliages?”

quote: “I can’t believe this whole thing is procedurally generated!”
author: Zoe

quote: “Breakin’ firewalls like they was suckas!” Zoe chuckles.

quote: “I’m called Zoe, but it’s just my smurf handle.”
author: Zoe

quote: “Did I recall to run the script? Oh, sh*t!”
author: Zoe

quote: “Math is lovely. Beautiful mathematics are all around us, and they can change the world for the better.”
author: Zoe

quote: “Later, I’m going to hack the government. Jump-roping, though, initially.”

quote: “Every system is vulnerable. We’ll track it down.”
author: Zoe

quote: “Man, they totally should’ve put this place in hybrid encryption, but they didn’t!”

quote: “We all have a different reality inside of us. possibly not you, though.”
author: Zoe

quote: “You might appear elsewhere in the sky or at a different moment. That would be preferable.”
author: Zoe

quote: “Is this the most accurate physical manifestation you can create? It is totally lacking in zazz!”
author: Zoe

quote: “From one of her portals, Zoe takes an ice cream cone, but she soon drops it.”

quote: “I have a magical gift for you! It’s coming soon!”
author: Zoe

quote: “Good assault! I guess it’s my turn now.

quote: “So this the type of game you like?”
author: Zoe

quote: “What a lovely little world you have… I enjoy it.”
author: Zoe

quote: “I’m not trying to hurt you. I simply do occasionally!”
author: Zoe

quote: “Your lives are short, but I love sparkles…”
author: Zoe

quote: “This is the precipice of a new reality!”
author: Zoe

quote: “I can’t help myself in doing mean things, sorry!”

quote: “You’re so funny, acting like magic hurts!”

quote: “You won’t be playing? You can count on me.”

quote: “Have some fun! The end of the world may be near… Or not!”

quote: “Oh, do you wanna do something, we should do something!”

quote: “Tag, that’s you! Hey, I told you you were it.

quote: “I do not want to mature. You cannot compel me.

quote: “This is the game you wanna play?”

quote: Things aren’t always what they seem.
author: Zyra

quote: Wait until my seeds take root.
author: Zyra

quote: No place is safe while I’m free!
